Text: Thank You--more than you can know--for Battle Beyond The Stars.  I know its a corny movie, but still one of my favorites--my VHS copy recorded from HBO disappeared about 12 years ago, coincidentally about the time of my divorce.
@azrielle: Unfortunately (maybe luckily) we both lost many things some time back. Things maybe were different, but reason and timing seems as the same.
two-thousand and forty thankies for these two classics, twentyforty. =^_^=
